description:
Shinra`s father and the main cause of most of the events in the story.
Shortly after the birth of Shinra he comes into possession of the demon blade Saika, which he later sells to Anri`s parents who own an antique shop. During a trip to Ireland with Shinra, who was aged four at that time, he cuts off Selty`s head and sells it to Namie`s uncle, head of Yagiri Pharmaceuticals. On the way back to Japan he discovers Selty on the ship who is trying to trace her head and offers her a place to stay in exchange for letting him dissect her body.
Not too long before the current day events he leaves Japan to work for Nebula Corporation in Amerika but comes back when Yagiri Pharmaceuticals is merged into Nebula.
name: Kishitani Shingen
